import React from 'react'; import { AutoLinkHeader, Example, Link as PatternflyThemeLink } from 'theme-patternfly-org/components'; import '../../../../node_modules/@patternfly/patternfly/docs/components/LogViewer/examples/./LogViewer.css'; const pageData = { "id": "Log viewer", "section": "components", "source": "html", "slug": "/components/log-viewer/html", "sourceLink": "https://github.com/patternfly/patternfly/blob/main/packages/docs/src/patternfly/components/LogViewer/examples/LogViewer.md", "beta": true, "cssPrefix": [ "pf-c-log-viewer" ], "examples": [ "Basic", "With line numbers", "With text wrapping", "With search results", "With max height", "With dropdown, drilldown, search expanded", "With popover open", "Dark" ] }; pageData.examples = { 'Basic': props =>
Choose one
